body:
Hello everyone!

As some of you may know, my YouTube channel has just hit 300 subscribers! <3

Because I have reached this milestone in just one year of YouTube (could be a lot, could be a little bit, depending on how you consider it), so I was thinking of doing something special!

I already have a pretty cool prank call recorded (yes, it is appropriate for all ages), but I have already done many other prank calls, so I need a new idea; something creative, for my 300 subscribers special video!

If you have any ideas, please make sure to let me know!

*I was going to do a giveaway, but I've decided to save that for 500 subscribers, if I ever reach that goal*.

Thanks everyone, stay awesome!
body_tagged:

As some of you may know, my YouTube channel has just hit 300 subscribers! <3

I already have a pretty cool prank call recorded (yes, it is appropriate for all ages), but I have already done many other prank calls, so I need a new idea; something creative, for my 300 subscribers special video!

If you have any ideas, please make sure to let me know!

*I was going to do a giveaway, but I've decided to save that for 500 subscribers, if I ever reach that goal*.

Thanks everyone, stay awesome!
